tool_description: Checks availability of domain names across multiple TLDs and provides pricing information from various registrars.

domain_names.description: List of domain names to check (without TLD)

tlds.description: List of top-level domains to check (.com, .org, .net, etc.)

include_premium.description: Include premium domain options in results

error_messages: Invalid domain format: Domain names must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens, cannot start or end with hyphens.
Invalid TLD format: TLDs must start with a dot and contain only letters (e.g., .com, .org).
Query limit exceeded: Maximum 50 domains and 20 TLDs per request.
Rate limit reached: Too many requests in short time period, wait 60 seconds before retrying.
usage: Provide arrays of domain names and TLDs to check. Optionally enable premium domain suggestions. Returns availability status and pricing for each combination.

results.description: Array of availability results for each domain-TLD combination

premium_suggestions.description: List of premium domain alternatives if requested
